body: It doesn't make any sense to write cmake to install test binaries. But maybe what I would appreciate is a little script that handles this, so we can put this in a centralized area. Actually, for other reasons, I'd like this binaries to show up in the torch directory for Linux too (my CircleCI config for PyTorch uses 7z rather than docker push).
